actionConfiguration.body:
select b4.chapter_tag,b4.percentage,b4.end_date,worksheet_status from(SELECT
DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY b3.chapter_tag ORDER BY b3.percentage , b3.end_date, b3.section_id)
			   
  AS ranking ,* from (select b2.chapter_tag,(ctt_cd_id/tdm_cd_id )*100 as percentage,b2.end_date,b2.section_id from (
	  
		  select ctt.chapter_tag,count(ctt.cd_id) as ctt_cd_id,b1.tdm_cd_id,ctt.section_id,max(ctt.end_date)as end_date from  (
			  
			  select  chapter_tag,count(cd_id) as tdm_cd_id from public.topic_detail_master tdm
			  
			  
group by chapter_tag)b1
	  
		 join public.course_theory_track ctt on ctt.chapter_tag = b1.chapter_tag
group by  ctt.chapter_tag,b1.tdm_cd_id,ctt.section_id )b2   
 group by b2.chapter_tag,b2.end_date,b2.ctt_cd_id,b2.tdm_cd_id,b2.section_id)b3)b4 
  
 join chapter_details_master cdm 
 on b4.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag
 left join content.chapter_dependance cd
  on b4.chapter_tag = cd.chapter_tag
 	where b4.ranking =1 and cdm.subject_id ={{RadioGroup1.selectedOptionValue}} and cdm.std = {{RadioGroup6.selectedOptionValue}}
	order by b4.chapter_tag
